ai.summary: Murlough Woodland Walk is an easy 4.6 km circuit through a sheltered woodland area within the Murlough Nature Reserve, offering gentle trails, shaded scenery, and potential wildlife encounters. Suitable for all ages and abilities, this calm stroll provides a peaceful woodland experience near the coast.
ai.terrain_summary: The route uses well-maintained forest paths with some boardwalk sections over damp ground. Surfaces are a mix of compact soil, gravel, and exposed roots; expect occasional mud after rain and gentle slopes. Footing is generally easy for most walkers.
ai.safety_notes: Stay on marked paths and be aware of weather changes; coastal winds can be strong. Wear sturdy footwear with good grip and bring a light waterproof layer. Check reserve access notices and be mindful of wildlife and habitats. Keep a safe distance from any cliff edges and supervise children at all times.
recommended_gear: Comfortable walking shoes or light hiking boots
Weather-appropriate clothing and a light waterproof layer
Map or GPS device / smartphone with offline map
ai.best_seasons: All year round; spring offers良 flowers and birdsong, summer is pleasant for shade, autumn brings colors, and winter can be muddy and windy.

seo.title: Murlough Woodland Walk — Easy 4.6 km Coastal Forest Trail in Northern Ireland, UK
seo.meta_description: Explore the easy 4.6 km Murlough Woodland Walk in Murlough Nature Reserve, Northern Ireland. A gentle forest circuit with boardwalks, wildlife, and coastal views—perfect for families and casual hikers.
seo.h1: Murlough Woodland Walk — 4.6 km Easy Forest Trail
